name: The Enchanted Cave 2
summary: Delve into a strange cave with a seemingly endless supply of treasure, strategically choosing your battles to gather as much treasure as possible! Find rare artifacts and traverse the skill tree to become your choice of a mage, warrior, alchemist, or a mix of skills. Craft potions or enchant your equipment with ingredients, and discover secret areas! But be careful because the cave has oddly become quite dangerous lately with more explorers going missing every day… The Enchanted Cave 2 is an RPG/roguelike with a heavy focus on risk vs reward. Strategically choosing your battles, building your character, enchanting your equipment and knowing when to escape the cave are crucial to succeed.
storyline:
in a small town, there exists a cave full of seemingly infinite treasure; this attracts many an adventurer to plunder its riches, but what they don't know until it's two late is that almost all the treasure is destroyed upon exiting the cave. No one knows where it goes, but it is probably redistributed throughout the cave for the next unfortunate soul to find. 
 
Another unknown thing found out too late is that you cannot exit the cave without the Escape Wings, and are stuck until you die or find these wings. 
 
Plus, you may find someone's journal entries; if you've got the eye for finding secrets... 
 
So, do you dare enter the cave; young traveler? Or will you play it safe and not delve where man does not belong?
